ch0287_40_svgirl/0101_0701_01_10:
When you’re with me, everything is double
the fun, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0287_40_svgirl/0101_0701_02_10:
Where should we go? And what should we
do? Just thinking about it is exciting!
ch0287_40_svgirl/7101_0701_02_10:
There’s something special about it—a feeling
you don’t get every day.
ch0287_40_svgirl/7102_0701_01_10:
The best way to grow closer to someone is
to share experiences with them!
ch0287_40_svgirl/7102_0701_02_10:
That’s how I got to know my friends from
Paldea better—and you too!
ch0287_40_svgirl/7103_0701_01_10:
The word “special” has a nice ring to it,
don’t you think?
ch0287_40_svgirl/7103_0701_02_10:
Put it in front of anything—battles, food—
and it’s like you’re getting a good deal!
ch0287_40_svgirl/7103_0701_03_10:
Although not for assignments and tests,
I guess. I’d prefer those NOT be special.
ch0287_40_svgirl/7104_0701_01_10:
I hope Terastallization’s sparkle keeps
spreading!
ch0287_40_svgirl/7104_0701_02_10:
Imagine if it covered all of Pasio. It would
shine like a star!
ch0287_40_svgirl/7105_0701_02_10:
I challenge you to a battle...to see who can
make the most memories here!
ch0287_40_svgirl/7105_0701_03_10: Hehehe! I’ll win this one for sure!
ch0287_40_svgirl/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s a symbol of my hope to get to know
you better!
ch0287_40_svgirl/1701_0702_02_10: Let’s make more memories together, OK?!
ch0287_40_svgirl/2501_0701_01_10: This outfit is super fancy, don’t you think?
ch0287_40_svgirl/2501_0701_02_10:
Lately, I’ve been wearing it to Pasio’s most
photogenic spots and taking tons of photos!
ch0287_40_svgirl/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ve taken so many, it’s hard to count,
but my favorite is probably...
ch0287_40_svgirl/2501_0702_02_10: the one I took next to that gold Lear statue!
ch0287_40_svgirl/2501_0702_03_10: I just like how everything’s so sparkly!
ch0287_40_svgirl/2511_0701_01_10:
Legendary Pokémon are so special,
they show up in historical records.
ch0287_40_svgirl/2511_0701_02_10:
Do you think there could be battles that
special, too?
ch0287_40_svgirl/2511_0701_03_10:
If none exist yet, we should make some
ourselves!
ch0287_40_svgirl/2511_0702_01_10:
Battles so legendary, they go down in
history, remembered by everyone...
ch0287_40_svgirl/2511_0702_02_10:
Yeah! I think I’ve found something new to
strive for on Pasio!
ch0287_40_svgirl/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Let’s have a Pokémon battle!
I’m feeling pumped today!
ch0287_40_svgirl/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m so hungry... With all the excitement,
I forgot to eat!
ch0287_40_svgirl/3005_0701_01_10:
Any day you have fun with a smile is
special!
